description.name: Digicert SSL
description.tagline: Automate the provisioning of ssl certificates in your WHMCS with DigiCert.
description.short: Automate the provisioning of ssl certificates in your WHMCS with DigiCert.
description.long: DigiCert is one of the most powerful company focused on digital security. This module allow to manage DigiCert products via WHMCS. For proper provisioning functionality, Digicert SSL Addon is required.
